title: 跪求大神翻译
author: gk900gk900
txt_content:
如题，本人玩了一个名叫植物魔法的MOD，发现污血吊坠没有汉化，百度翻译又不准确，所以请求大神帮忙翻译。
Messing around with the origianl source of the Potion design, the Nether,seem to work fairly well at harnessing that very power.
The Tainted Blood Pendant allows one to store a Brew in a condensed,wering it will apply the effect while it's worn ,for the cost of Mana depending on the power of the Brew.
To infuse the pendant with a Brew the noemal procedure of increases by a tenfold,though.
however,the pendant will not accept any and all effects,a few don't seem to behave well,such as Instant Health or Absorption.Lastly,Brews with more than one effect will fail as well.
以上为内容。

replies.author: a4501150
replies.txt_content:
地狱，充斥围绕着剧毒的源头， 似乎可以充分利用地狱这巨大的能量。

腐血吊坠允许玩家储存药水并且浓缩它，佩戴腐血吊坠并且紧握可以使之发挥作用， 法力的消耗值取决于酿造物的能量。

不过要充满腐血吊坠需要十个酿造物

但是，吊坠并不会接受全方位药水（意思你只能放一种）， 一些药水可能表现的不会太好，例如生命立即恢复或者伤害吸收药水. 最后, 拥有多重效果的药水将会不起作用

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
